content.p: Would you like to help inspire, share your knowledge, stories and expertise with our students and staff or mentor our budding entrepreneurs? We provide lots of opportunities for alumni to give your time to benefit you and your community! All of our opportunities are designed to be flexible whether you have 30 minutes or want a more long term commitment, whether you are at home or at work, or live across the world. There is something to suit everyone and your support will make a huge difference. Feel free to contact us if you would like to develop some new activity with us. Our volunteers make the world of difference to the lives of students, staff and researchers at The University of Nottingham. The rewarding effects don't stop there, giving your time also helps you to: Drop an email to Alumni Relations to register your interest in giving your time and we will contact you when a relevant opportunity becomes available. Participate in engaging discussions, network with fellow alumni and discover new ideas! Our Masterclasses are designed to inspire, nurture and empower. They provide alumni with an opportunity to develop in an area of interest. It is also an opportunity to reconnect with former classmates and colleagues, participate in engaging interactive discussions, learn of new developments at the University and to meet with current staff. If you would like to know more about masterclass, email us. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8373 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8657 email: alumnirelations@nottingham.edu.my
